content: What is the status of this - https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-7864 ?  cc: <@774033563732541451> <@427491045308235776>

author: codygunton
content: I just inaugurated our new ZKVM verifier specs repo with an issue recording an observation for my first attempt at making specs of the PCS verifier in pil2-proofman. Will share more on that project once it's in a better place, but for now, here's the issue for those who might be interested https://github.com/eth-act/zkvm-verifier-specs/issues/1
